title: Dark Mode
content: Dark ModeThe dark mode component will toggle between dark and light and save the result to localStorage.InstallationTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via npm:npm install vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via pnpm:pnpm add vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via yarn:yarn add vanilla-headlessUse unpkg.com cdn&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;Use jsdelivr.net cdn&lt;script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;UseImport vanilla-headless to javascript to initialize the plugin.import "vanilla-headless"Basic example (no styling)  Use additional HTML and CSS to make it unique.12345&lt;headless-darkmode&gt;  &lt;button type="button"&gt;    Text  &lt;/button&gt;&lt;/headless-darkmode&gt;Styled with TailwindCSS  The example require TailwindCSS12345678&lt;headless-darkmode class="inline-flex"&gt;  &lt;button type="button" class="px-4 py-2 flex justify-center space-x-2 inline-block rounded-md dark:bg-white dark:text-gray-600  bg-gray-700 text-gray-100 shadow-md"&gt;    &lt;svg style="width:24px;height:24px" viewBox="0 0 24 24"&gt;      &lt;path fill="currentColor" d="M7.5,2C5.71,3.15 4.5,5.18 4.5,7.5C4.5,9.82 5.71,11.85 7.53,13C4.46,13 2,10.54 2,7.5A5.5,5.5 0 0,1 7.5,2M19.07,3.5L20.5,4.93L4.93,20.5L3.5,19.07L19.07,3.5M12.89,5.93L11.41,5L9.97,6L10.39,4.3L9,3.24L10.75,3.12L11.33,1.47L12,3.1L13.73,3.13L12.38,4.26L12.89,5.93M9.59,9.54L8.43,8.81L7.31,9.59L7.65,8.27L6.56,7.44L7.92,7.35L8.37,6.06L8.88,7.33L10.24,7.36L9.19,8.23L9.59,9.54M19,13.5A5.5,5.5 0 0,1 13.5,19C12.28,19 11.15,18.6 10.24,17.93L17.93,10.24C18.6,11.15 19,12.28 19,13.5M14.6,20.08L17.37,18.93L17.13,22.28L14.6,20.08M18.93,17.38L20.08,14.61L22.28,17.15L18.93,17.38M20.08,12.42L18.94,9.64L22.28,9.88L20.08,12.42M9.63,18.93L12.4,20.08L9.87,22.27L9.63,18.93Z" /&gt;    &lt;/svg&gt;    &lt;span&gt;Dark Mode&lt;/span&gt;  &lt;/button&gt;&lt;/headless-darkmode&gt;Accessibility notesFocus managementClicking the button to focus the button.Mouse interactionClicking the button to toggle state of component.Keyboard interaction            Command      Description                  Click button      Toggle Darkmode              Enter or Space when button is focused      Toggle Darkmode

title: Disclosure (Accordion)
content: Disclosure (Accordion)The disclosure  component is UI pattern for showing and hiding a single or a list of grouped elements. The is common used for FAQ sections on most websites.InstallationTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via npm:npm install vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via pnpm:pnpm add vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via yarn:yarn add vanilla-headlessUse unpkg.com cdn&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;Use jsdelivr.net cdn&lt;script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;UseImport vanilla-headless to javascript to initialize the plugin.import "vanilla-headless"Basic example (no styling)  Use additional HTML and CSS to make it unique.123456789101112131415161718&lt;headless-disclosure&gt;  &lt;button aria-controls="faq1_desc" aria-expanded="false" type="button"&gt;    What do I do if I have a permit for an assigned lot, but can't find a space there?  &lt;/button&gt;  &lt;div id="faq1_desc"&gt;    Park at the nearest available parking meter without paying the meter and call 999-999-9999 to report the    problem. We will note and approve your alternate location and will    investigate the cause of the shortage in your assigned facility.  &lt;/div&gt;  &lt;button aria-controls="faq2_desc" aria-expanded="false" type="button"&gt;    What do I do if I lose my permit or if my permit is stolen?  &lt;/button&gt;  &lt;div id="faq2_desc"&gt;    You should come to the Parking office and report the loss. There is a fee to replace your lost permit. However,    if your permit was stolen, a copy of a police report needs    to be submitted along with a stolen parking permit form for a fee replacement exemption.  &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/headless-disclosure&gt;Styled with TailwindCSS  The example require TailwindCSS1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829&lt;headless-disclosure class="mx-auto w-full max-w-md rounded-md bg-white p-2"&gt;  &lt;dl class="faq"&gt;    &lt;dt&gt;      &lt;button aria-controls="faq1_desc" aria-expanded="true" class="flex w-full rounded-md bg-blue-100 px-4 py-2 text-left text-sm font-medium text-blue-900 hover:bg-blue-200 focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-blue-500 focus-visible:ring-opacity-75 mb-2" type="button"&gt;        What do I do if I have a permit for an assigned lot, but can't find a space there?      &lt;/button&gt;    &lt;/dt&gt;    &lt;dd&gt;      &lt;div class="px-4 pt-4 pb-2 text-sm text-gray-500" id="faq1_desc"&gt;        Park at the nearest available parking meter without paying the meter and call 999-999-9999 to report the        problem. We will note and approve your alternate location and will        investigate the cause of the shortage in your assigned facility.      &lt;/div&gt;    &lt;/dd&gt;    &lt;dt&gt;      &lt;button aria-controls="faq2_desc" aria-expanded="true" class="flex w-full rounded-md bg-blue-100 px-4 py-2 text-left text-sm font-medium text-blue-900 hover:bg-blue-200 focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-blue-500 focus-visible:ring-opacity-75 mb-2" type="button"&gt;        What do I do if I have a permit for an assigned lot, but can't find a space there?      &lt;/button&gt;    &lt;/dt&gt;    &lt;dd&gt;      &lt;div class="px-4 pt-4 pb-2 text-sm text-gray-500" id="faq2_desc"&gt;        Park at the nearest available parking meter without paying the meter and call 999-999-9999 to report the        problem. We will note and approve your alternate location and will        investigate the cause of the shortage in your assigned facility.      &lt;/div&gt;    &lt;/dd&gt;      &lt;/dl&gt;&lt;/headless-disclosure&gt;Accessibility notesFocus managementClicking the button to add focus to the current element.Mouse interactionClicking the button will toggle the targeted elements.Keyboard interaction            Command      Description                  Click button      Toggle disclosure              Enter or Space when button is focused      Toggle disclosure              Tab      Navigate down with with keys              Shift + Tab      Navigate up with with keys

title: Menu (Dropdown)
content: Menu (Dropdown)The dropdown component allow you to create a custom web accessible dropdown with keyboard and mouse events.InstallationTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via npm:npm install vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via pnpm:pnpm add vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via yarn:yarn add vanilla-headlessUse unpkg.com cdn&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;Use jsdelivr.net cdn&lt;script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;UseImport vanilla-headless to javascript to initialize the plugin.import "vanilla-headless"Basic example (no styling)  Use additional HTML and CSS to make it unique.12345678&lt;headless-dropdown&gt;  &lt;button id="menu-button" type="button" aria-expanded="true" aria-haspopup="true"&gt;Dropdown&lt;/button&gt;  &lt;div aria-labelledby="menu-button" role="menu" aria-orientation="vertical" tabindex="-1"&gt;      &lt;a href="#" role="menuitem" id="menu-item-0"&gt;Account settings&lt;/a&gt;      &lt;a href="#" role="menuitem" id="menu-item-1"&gt;Support&lt;/a&gt;      &lt;a href="#" role="menuitem" id="menu-item-2"&gt;License&lt;/a&gt;  &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/headless-dropdown&gt;Styled with TailwindCSS  The example require TailwindCSS and  @tailwindcss/forms1234567891011121314151617181920&lt;headless-dropdown popper offset="0 10" placement="bottom-end bottom-start" class="relative inline-block text-left"&gt;  &lt;button type="button" class="inline-flex justify-center w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm px-4 py-2 bg-white text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-offset-gray-100 focus:ring-indigo-500" id="menu-button" aria-expanded="true" aria-haspopup="true"&gt;    Options    &lt;svg class="-mr-1 ml-2 h-5 w-5" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true"&gt;      &lt;path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M5.293 7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0L10 10.586l3.293-3.293a1 1 0 111.414 1.414l-4 4a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 010-1.414z" clip-rule="evenodd" /&gt;    &lt;/svg&gt;  &lt;/button&gt;    &lt;div aria-labelledby="menu-button" class=" absolute w-56"&gt;      &lt;div class="animate-[open_0.15s_ease] origin-top-right rounded-md shadow-lg bg-white ring-1 ring-black ring-opacity-5 focus:outline-none" role="menu" aria-orientation="vertical" tabindex="-1"&gt;        &lt;div class="py-1" role="none"&gt;          &lt;a href="#" class="text-gray-700 block px-4 py-2 text-sm" role="menuitem" tabindex="-1" id="menu-item-0"&gt;Account settings&lt;/a&gt;          &lt;a href="#" class="text-gray-700 block px-4 py-2 text-sm" role="menuitem" tabindex="-1" id="menu-item-1"&gt;Support&lt;/a&gt;          &lt;a href="#" class="text-gray-700 block px-4 py-2 text-sm" role="menuitem" tabindex="-1" id="menu-item-2"&gt;License&lt;/a&gt;          &lt;form method="POST" action="#" role="none"&gt;            &lt;button type="submit" class="text-gray-700 block w-full text-left px-4 py-2 text-sm" role="menuitem" tabindex="-1" id="menu-item-3"&gt;Sign out&lt;/button&gt;          &lt;/form&gt;        &lt;/div&gt;      &lt;/div&gt;    &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/headless-dropdown&gt;Accessibility notesFocus managementClicking on button set focus to it. Focus will be removed by pressing Escape key and clicking outside the target element.Mouse interactionClicking on button will toggle on state of dropdown component. Clicking off the target element will close all dropdown components on page.Keyboard interaction            Command      Description                  Click button      Toggle dropdown              Enter or Space when button is focused      Toggle dropdown              Arrow key when button is focus      Open dropdown              Escape key when window is active      Close all open elements on page              Click outside component      Close all open elements on page              Tab, DownArrow, RightArrow keys      Navigate down with with keys              Shift + Tab, UpArrow, RightArrow keys      Navigate up with with keys      PopperJsPopperJs is already bundle in and only require an attribute of popper to work. PopperJs only works on Popover, DropDown and Navigation component.Optional  Popper.js          Required: Add attribute of popper or popper=”true” to enable popper.js      Change placement with attribute placement=”bottom-end bottom-start”      Change offset with attribute offset=”0 20”      &lt;headless-dropdown popper placement="bottom-end bottom-start" ....&lt;headless-dropdown popper="true" placement="bottom-end,bottom-start" ....&lt;headless-dropdown popper offset="0 20" ....&lt;headless-dropdown popper="true" offset="0,20" ....

title: Documentation
content: DocumentationInstallationTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via npm:npm install vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via pnpm:pnpm add vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via yarn:yarn add vanilla-headlessUse unpkg.com cdn&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;Use jsdelivr.net cdn&lt;script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;UseImport vanilla-headless to javascript to initialize the plugin.import "vanilla-headless"

title: Popover
content: PopoverPopover component is perfect for showing and hide elements on pages. Works nice in navigation menus, hide figure captions and creating flyout menus.InstallationTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via npm:npm install vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via pnpm:pnpm add vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via yarn:yarn add vanilla-headlessUse unpkg.com cdn&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;Use jsdelivr.net cdn&lt;script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;UseImport vanilla-headless to javascript to initialize the plugin.import "vanilla-headless"Basic example (no styling)  Use additional HTML and CSS to make it unique.123456&lt;headless-popover&gt;    &lt;button id="popover" type="button" aria-expanded="true" aria-haspopup="true"&gt;Popover&lt;/button&gt;    &lt;div aria-labelledby="popover"&gt;        Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.    &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/headless-popover&gt;Styled with TailwindCSS  The example require TailwindCSS1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647&lt;headless-popover class="relative" offset="0 10" placement="bottom-end bottom" popper&gt;  &lt;button aria-expanded="true" aria-haspopup="true" class="inline-flex justify-center w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm px-4 py-2 bg-white text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-offset-gray-100 focus:ring-sky-500" id="popover" type="button"&gt;    Popover    &lt;!-- Heroicon name: solid/chevron-down --&gt;    &lt;svg aria-hidden="true" class="-mr-1 ml-2 h-5 w-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"&gt;      &lt;path clip-rule="evenodd" d="M5.293 7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0L10 10.586l3.293-3.293a1 1 0 111.414 1.414l-4 4a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 010-1.414z" fill-rule="evenodd" /&gt;    &lt;/svg&gt;  &lt;/button&gt;  &lt;div aria-labelledby="popover" class="absolute z-10 w-screen max-w-sm  transform px-4 sm:px-0"&gt;    &lt;div class="overflow-hidden rounded-lg shadow-lg ring-1 ring-black ring-opacity-5"&gt;      &lt;div class="relative grid gap-8 bg-white p-7"&gt;        &lt;a class="-m-3 flex items-center rounded-lg p-2 transition duration-150 ease-in-out hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-sky-500 focus-visible:ring-opacity-50" href="#"&gt;          &lt;span&gt;            &lt;svg aria-hidden="true" fill="none" height="48" viewBox="0 0 48 48" width="48" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"&gt;              &lt;rect fill="#e0f2fe" height="48" rx="8" width="48"&gt;&lt;/rect&gt;              &lt;path d="M24 11L35.2583 17.5V30.5L24 37L12.7417 30.5V17.5L24 11Z" stroke="#0ea5e9" stroke-width="2"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;              &lt;path clip-rule="evenodd" d="M16.7417 19.8094V28.1906L24 32.3812L31.2584 28.1906V19.8094L24 15.6188L16.7417 19.8094Z" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="#0284c7" stroke-width="2"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;              &lt;path clip-rule="evenodd" d="M20.7417 22.1196V25.882L24 27.7632L27.2584 25.882V22.1196L24 20.2384L20.7417 22.1196Z" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="#0284c7" stroke-width="2"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;            &lt;/svg&gt;          &lt;/span&gt;          &lt;span class="ml-2"&gt; Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur. &lt;/span&gt;        &lt;/a&gt;        &lt;a class="-m-3 flex items-center rounded-lg p-2 transition duration-150 ease-in-out hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-sky-500 focus-visible:ring-opacity-50" href="#"&gt;          &lt;span&gt;            &lt;svg aria-hidden="true" fill="none" height="48" viewBox="0 0 48 48" width="48" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"&gt;              &lt;rect fill="#e0f2fe" height="48" rx="8" width="48"&gt;&lt;/rect&gt;              &lt;path d="M24 11L35.2583 17.5V30.5L24 37L12.7417 30.5V17.5L24 11Z" stroke="#0ea5e9" stroke-width="2"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;              &lt;path clip-rule="evenodd" d="M16.7417 19.8094V28.1906L24 32.3812L31.2584 28.1906V19.8094L24 15.6188L16.7417 19.8094Z" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="#0284c7" stroke-width="2"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;              &lt;path clip-rule="evenodd" d="M20.7417 22.1196V25.882L24 27.7632L27.2584 25.882V22.1196L24 20.2384L20.7417 22.1196Z" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="#0284c7" stroke-width="2"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;            &lt;/svg&gt;          &lt;/span&gt;          &lt;span class="ml-2"&gt; Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur. &lt;/span&gt;        &lt;/a&gt;        &lt;a class="-m-3 flex items-center rounded-lg p-2 transition duration-150 ease-in-out hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-sky-500 focus-visible:ring-opacity-50" href="#"&gt;          &lt;span&gt;            &lt;svg aria-hidden="true" fill="none" height="48" viewBox="0 0 48 48" width="48" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"&gt;              &lt;rect fill="#e0f2fe" height="48" rx="8" width="48"&gt;&lt;/rect&gt;              &lt;path d="M24 11L35.2583 17.5V30.5L24 37L12.7417 30.5V17.5L24 11Z" stroke="#0ea5e9" stroke-width="2"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;              &lt;path clip-rule="evenodd" d="M16.7417 19.8094V28.1906L24 32.3812L31.2584 28.1906V19.8094L24 15.6188L16.7417 19.8094Z" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="#0284c7" stroke-width="2"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;              &lt;path clip-rule="evenodd" d="M20.7417 22.1196V25.882L24 27.7632L27.2584 25.882V22.1196L24 20.2384L20.7417 22.1196Z" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="#0284c7" stroke-width="2"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;            &lt;/svg&gt;          &lt;/span&gt;          &lt;span class="ml-2"&gt; Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur. &lt;/span&gt;        &lt;/a&gt;      &lt;/div&gt;    &lt;/div&gt;  &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/headless-popover&gt;Accessibility notesFocus managementClicking on button set focus to it. Focus will be removed by pressing Escape key and clicking outside the target element.Mouse interactionClicking on button will toggle on state of target element. Clicking off the target element will close all dropdown components on page.Keyboard interaction            Command      Description                  Click button      Toggle dropdown              Enter or Space when button is focused      Toggle dropdown              Arrow key when button is focus      Open dropdown              Escape key when window is active      Close all open elements on page              Click outside component      Close all open elements on page

title: Switch (Toggle)
content: Switch (Toggle)Switches are custom element that allow you to toggle between two states using mouse and keyboard event. By default, the component only do two things. First it will change attribute aria-checked of button and secondly it will add a data attribute of data-switch to root of component. This data attribute can be additional add to any element within the component.InstallationTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via npm:npm install vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via pnpm:pnpm add vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via yarn:yarn add vanilla-headlessUse unpkg.com cdn&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;Use jsdelivr.net cdn&lt;script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;UseImport vanilla-headless to javascript to initialize the plugin.import "vanilla-headless"Basic example (no styling)  Use additional HTML and CSS to make it unique.12345&lt;headless-toggle&gt;    &lt;button type="button" aria-checked="true"&gt;        toggle    &lt;/button&gt;&lt;/headless-toggle&gt;Styled with TailwindCSS  The example require TailwindCSS and tailwindcss-headless-attributes123456&lt;headless-toggle class="flex items-center group"&gt;    &lt;button aria-checked="true" class="group-data-switch-on:bg-blue-500 bg-gray-200 relative inline-flex flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-11 border-2  border-transparent rounded-full cursor-pointer transition-colors ease-in-out duration-200 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-indigo-500" type="button"&gt;        &lt;span class="sr-only"&gt;Use setting&lt;/span&gt;        &lt;span aria-hidden="true" class="group-data-switch-on:translate-x-5 translate-x-0 pointer-events-none inline-block h-5 w-5 rounded-full bg-white shadow transform ring-0 transition ease-in-out duration-50" data-switch&gt;&lt;/span&gt;    &lt;/button&gt;&lt;/headless-toggle&gt;Styling toggle state with css (without tailwindcss-headless-attributes)1234567headless-toggle[data-switch="on"] button[aria-checked] {    background: indigo;}headless-toggle[data-switch="on"] span[aria-hidden="true"] {transform: translateX(20px);}Accessibility notesFocus managementClicking the button to focus on switch or use tab key to focus in and out using native keyboard events.Mouse interactionClicking the button to toggle selected switch.Keyboard interaction            Command      Description                  Click button      Toggle switch              Enter or Space when button is focused      Toggle switch              Tab      Focus in and out              Shift + Tab      Focus in and out

title: Button
content: ButtonThe button component acts just like a normal button, but with the added feature by adding aria-pressed on mouse and keyboard events.InstallationTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via npm:npm install vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via pnpm:pnpm add vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via yarn:yarn add vanilla-headlessUse unpkg.com cdn&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;Use jsdelivr.net cdn&lt;script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;UseImport vanilla-headless to javascript to initialize the plugin.import "vanilla-headless"Basic example (no styling)  Use additional HTML and CSS to make it unique.123&lt;button type="button" is="headless-button"&gt;    Button&lt;/button&gt;Styled with TailwindCSS  The example require TailwindCSS and tailwindcss-headless-attributes123&lt;button is="headless-button" type="button" class="inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border border-transparent text-sm font-medium rounded-md shadow-sm text-white bg-pink-600 hover:bg-pink-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-pink-500"&gt;    Button text&lt;/button&gt;Styling toggle state with css (without tailwindcss-headless-attributes)123[aria-pressed="true"]  {    background: indigo;}Accessibility notesMouse interactionClicking the button to toggle aria-pressed state on mouse up and mouse down.Keyboard interaction            Command      Description                  Key down button      Set aria-pressed="true"              Key up button      Set aria-pressed="false"

title: Go-Back
content: Go-BackThe headless-goback button directive allow to go-back to previous page using the navigator history api. This directive extends the headless-button directive.InstallationTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via npm:npm install vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via pnpm:pnpm add vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via yarn:yarn add vanilla-headlessUse unpkg.com cdn&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;Use jsdelivr.net cdn&lt;script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;UseImport vanilla-headless to javascript to initialize the plugin.import "vanilla-headless"Basic example (no styling)  Use additional HTML and CSS to make it unique.123&lt;button type="button" is="headless-goback"&gt;    Go Back&lt;/button&gt;Styled with TailwindCSS  The example require TailwindCSS123456&lt;button is="headless-goback" type="button" class="inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border border-transparent shadow-sm text-base font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-indigo-500"&gt;    &lt;svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" class="-ml-1 mr-3 h-5 w-5"&gt;        &lt;path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M15.75 19.5L8.25 12l7.5-7.5" /&gt;    &lt;/svg&gt;    Previous Page&lt;/button&gt;Accessibility notesThe headless-goback inherit with headless-button directive interactions.Mouse interactionClick the button to navigate to previous visited page.Keyboard interaction            Command      Description                  Keydown for Space, Enter      Navigate to previous visited page

title: Scroll Top
content: Scroll TopThe headless-scrolltop button directive makes it super easy to add a scroll to top feature to your website. This directive extends the headless-button directive.InstallationTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via npm:npm install vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via pnpm:pnpm add vanilla-headlessTo get started, install Vanilla-headless via yarn:yarn add vanilla-headlessUse unpkg.com cdn&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;Use jsdelivr.net cdn&lt;script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-headless@latest"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;UseImport vanilla-headless to javascript to initialize the plugin.import "vanilla-headless"Basic example (no styling)  Use additional HTML and CSS to make it unique.123&lt;button type="button" is="headless-scrolltop"&gt;    To Top&lt;/button&gt;Styled with TailwindCSS  The example require TailwindCSS123456&lt;button is="headless-scrolltop" class="fixed grid bg-gray-100 z-50 bottom-10 right-10 border border-gray-200 rounded-md h-10 w-10 justify-center items-center hover:bg-green-100 hover:text-green-900 hover:border-green-900 hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-100" type="button"&gt;    &lt;span class="sr-only"&gt;Scroll to top&lt;/span&gt;        &lt;svg aria-hidden="true" class="w-6 h-6" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"&gt;        &lt;path d="M3 4.5h14.25M3 9h9.75M3 13.5h5.25m5.25-.75L17.25 9m0 0L21 12.75M17.25 9v12" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" /&gt;    &lt;/svg&gt;&lt;/button&gt;Accessibility notesThe headless-scrolltop inherit with headless-button directive interactions.Mouse interactionClick the button to scroll to top of page.Keyboard interaction            Command      Description                  Keydown for Space, Enter and Ctrl + Home      Scroll to top of page
